File format : TIFF
Resolution  : 3680 x 2760
---- TIFF ----
Version 20306
Little-endian (Intel, II)
---- IFD0 ----
0x0100 ImageWidth = 3680
0x0101 ImageLength = 2760
0x0102 BitsPerSample = 16
0x0103 Compression = 1
0x0106 PhotometricInterpretation = 1
0x010e ImageDescription = OLYMPUS DIGITAL CAMERA         
0x010f Make = OLYMPUS IMAGING CORP.  
0x0110 Model = XZ-1            
0x0111 PreviewImageStart = 1478144
0x0112 Orientation = 1
0x0115 SamplesPerPixel = 1
0x0116 RowsPerStrip = 2760
0x0117 PreviewImageLength = 9942960
0x011a XResolution = 314/1 (314.0)
0x011b YResolution = 314/1 (314.0)
0x011c PlanarConfiguration = 1
0x0128 ResolutionUnit = 2
0x0131 Software = Version 1.4                    
0x0132 DateTime = 2014:12:28 15:50:57
0x013b Artist = []
0x8298 Copyright = []
0x8769 ExifOffset = 290
0xc4a5 PrintIM = [528 bytes]

---- ExifIFD ----
0x829a ExposureTime = 1/640 (0.001563)
0x829d FNumber = 40/10 (4.0)
0x8822 ExposureProgram = 2
0x8827 PhotographicSensitivity = 100
0x9000 ExifVersion = [0x30, 0x32, 0x32, 0x31]
0x9003 DateTimeOriginal = 2014:12:28 15:50:57
0x9004 DateTimeDigitized = 2014:12:28 15:50:57
0x9204 ExposureCompensation = 0/10 (0.0)
0x9205 MaxApertureValue = 170/100 (1.7)
0x9207 MeteringMode = 2
0x9208 LightSource = 0
0x9209 Flash = 24
0x920a FocalLength = 1527/100 (15.27)
0x927c MakerNote = [1474972 bytes]
0x9286 UserComment =                                                                                                                      
0xa000 FlashpixVersion = [0x30, 0x31, 0x30, 0x30]
0x00-1 Unknown = 1
0xa300 FileSource = 3
0xa302 CFAPattern = [0x02, 0x00, 0x02, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, 0x01, 0x02]
0xa401 CustomRendered = 1
0xa402 ExposureMode = 0
0xa403 WhiteBalance = 1
0xa404 DigitalZoomRatio = 100/100 (1.0)
